snippet: The former intelligence official was said to have helped Alberto Nisman, found dead last month, in his inquiry into a 1994 bombing in Buenos Aires.
abstract: Argentina's former spy chief Antonio Stiusso is asked to testify in inquiry into death of prosecutor Alberto Nisman, who was investigating 1994 bombing of Jewish center in Buenos Aires that killed 85 people.

byline.contributor: Charles Newbery and Jonathan Gilbert contributed reporting.

lead_paragraph: The former intelligence official was said to have helped Alberto Nisman, found dead last month, in his inquiry into a 1994 bombing in Buenos Aires.

headline.main: Ex-Spymaster Is Called to Testify in Investigation of Argentine Prosecutor’s Death
headline.print_headline: Ex-Spymaster Is Called to Testify in Investigation of Argentine Prosecutor’s Death
